name: The Lute & The Liar
description:
In a small woodland somewhere in albion lies a beast that can only be quelled by the sound of a young adventurers lute.

Venture into the forest, dodge the ancient beasts attacks and successfully calm him to delay the invasion of your town.

How to play:

  • WASD to move
  • HJKL to strum
  • Space bar to jump

By Josh Duffety Wong & Connor Thompson
